synopsis.text: Yamaboshi High School's Cultural Research Club is home to five students: Taichi, Iori, Himeko, Yoshifumi, and Yui. When the group stumbles upon an inexplicable phenomenon causing them to randomly swap bodies, their ordinary lives spiral into chaos. Initially finding amusement in their newfound predicament, the friends soon uncover each other's hidden emotional scars as they grapple with the mysterious force behind their situation. As their once-peaceful lives crumble and their relationships evolve, the club members must confront their deepest secrets, testing the limits of their friendship. Will their bond emerge stronger, or will it shatter under the weight of their shared burdens? Dive into the world of the Cultural Research Club and uncover the truth behind their extraordinary ordeal.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
